statuses.description: The task or project has been initiated but no further action has been taken yet.
The task or project is currently in progress.
The task or project has been completed and delivered or made available to the intended audience or recipients.
The task or project output has been received or acknowledged by the intended audience or recipients.
The task or project output has been signed or approved by the intended audience or recipients.
The task or project has been reviewed and rejected or not approved.
The task or project has been fully completed and all associated activities have been finalized.
